page.title: 20Houses in Chalfont St Peter
page.content: If you wished to move to this area you would find that houses are expensive. A 3 bedroomed terraced house would cost about 37000 pounds,and a 3 bed- roomed semi detached house costs at least 55000 pounds!A 3 bedroomed detached house costs around 80 or 90 thousand pounds.Some houses cost even more. A house for sale in Gerrards Cross at the moment is advertised at 196000 pounds! It overlooks Chalfont Park and has a "fabulous indoor swimming pool". It has 5 bedrooms,2 bathrooms,a shower room,2 changing rooms and a games room. Obviously a popular place ,this area is an easy travelling distance from London, is set in attractive country, has both private and county schools and has enough amenities to attract people to come to live here.
